subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The starting gate of the Kentucky Derby is coveted real estate, considering 377 of the 35,068 thoroughbreds born in 2008 were nominated to this year’s Triple Crown.
snippet: The starting gate of the Kentucky Derby is coveted real estate, considering 377 of the 35,068 thoroughbreds born in 2008 were nominated to this year’s Triple Crown.
